item.title: Modules for Drupal Audit
item.description: The following modules are needed: 1drush en site_audit -y 2drush en hacked -y 3drush en diff -y 4drush en seo_checklist -y 5drush en security_review -y 6drush en unused_modules -y All of the resulting reports will be in Admin > Reports. Exception is "Unused Modules" where you need to go to Admin > Configuration > Development
